Html:
Hello again, thanks for this site by the way, Ive really made head way with my club site and hope to be going live with it soon.

How can I change the date format to that we use in the UK and set the time to British summer time?

Thanks Again

It should just work out-of-the-box whatever time zone it is.

We will have better support for the whole Time Zone thing once Visual Studio 2008 (and v3.5 of the .NET Framwork) ships.
